mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FLOW_CONFIG_EXTEND (PROC_DEF_KEY_, KEY_ONE_, KEY_TWO_, KEY_THREE_, KEY_FOUR_, KEY_FIVE_, KEY_SIX_, KEY_SEVEN_, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME) VALUE (#{procDefKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyOne, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyTwo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyThree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyFour, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyFive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keySix, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keySeven}, #{createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=DATE});
mapper.update: UPDATE FLOW_CONFIG_EXTEND SET KEY_ONE_ = #{keyOne}, KEY_TWO_ = #{keyTwo}, KEY_THREE_ = #{keyThree}, KEY_FOUR_ = #{keyFour}, KEY_FIVE_ = #{keyFive}, KEY_SIX_ = #{keySix}, KEY_SEVEN_ = #{keySeven}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime} WHERE PROC_DEF_KEY_ = #{procDefKey}
